programme.title: Walking Hadrian's Wall With Robson Green
programme.desc: Robson gears up for the remaining 46 miles of his trek along Hadrian's Wall. After an early start in the shadow of Winshield Crags, he crosses the border from Northumbria to Cumbria at Gilsland, where he finds playful graffiti from the Romans.
